<<<<<<< HEAD
The blessednes of the Virgin Marie the mother of our Lord Iesvs Christ. Shaw, John, 1559-1625.
134 p.
Printed by Richard Field dwelling in Great Woodstreete, [London : 1618]
By John Shaw. A sermon. Page 57 misnumbered 23. Running title reads: The blessednes of Marie. Copy filmed lacks title page and other preliminary pages. Title and imprint from Bodleian Library copy spliced (beginning-page 25) at end. Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
=======

Printed by Richard Field dwelling in Great Woodstreete, [London : 1618]
By John Shaw. A sermon. Page 57 misnumbered 23. Running title reads: The blessednes of Marie. Copy filmed lacks title page and other preliminary pages. Title and imprint from Bodleian Library copy spliced (beginning-page 25) at end. Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
Richard Field
Great Woodstreete
